```{r}

library(readr)

ds1 <- read_delim("data/As_DD_2018.csv", 
    delim = ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)

ds2 <- read_delim("data/B(a)P_DD_2018.csv", 
    delim = ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)

ds3 <- read_delim("data/Cd_DD_2018.csv", 
    delim = ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)

ds4 <- read_delim("data/Ni_DD_2018.csv", 
    delim = ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)

ds5 <- read_delim("data/Pb_DD_2018.csv", 
    delim = ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)

ds6 <- read_delim("data/PM2.5_DD_2018.csv", 
    delim = ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)

ds7 <- read_delim("data/PM10_DD_2018.csv", 
    delim = ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)

```


```{r}

library(tidyr)
library(tidyverse)

ds_c <- rbind(ds1, ds2, ds3, ds4, ds5, ds6, ds7)

ds_t <- pivot_longer(ds_c, -(PROVINCIA:MES),names_to = "DIA", values_to = "VALOR", names_prefix = 'D')

```
